title: include browser version in user agent string
body: Microsoft Edge on windows does not include the version of the browser but only the version of layout engine:

comments.body: On Android the Edge user agent is like this: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; Moto G (5) Build/NPPS25.137-33-10) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.145 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/41.0.0.1270
